comment: She was a very good teacher! Organized and easy to follow!
Fun class, pretty easy, lots of online homework from the textbook!

Mrs. Drought I think is great teacher. She knows a lot about the French language and it is very easy to get a good grade in her class. She always says she is more focused on the students "learning and understanding" more so that grades. Also, I suggest going to the foreign language lab. She gives extra credit for that and a lot of other things!
I loved her class so much!

Madame Drought was a very helpful instructor. I liked how she used games in class to help us learn. Overall, I would suggest her to everyone. If you want to learn the language of French, have a good time and get an A (if you study), you should take her!
She was great!  I enjoyed the different games she used to help instill the vocabulary.  She made learning interesting.

She is certainly interested in what her students have to say.She's very down to Earth, and amusing at times. Just watch for some her pronunciations, to very picky learners, it can cut your ears. But, leave no doubt, she's a great Professor to have for an entry level course. You will learn as long as you study (Moderately).

She is one of the BEST professors I have ever had. TAKE HER!!! She makes sure you learn French in her class but is still very easy and accommodating. She is awesome and very helpful and cares about her students as long as they care about themselves. Tests are not hard if you study and learn your vocab. Do the Supercite!
Great class!! Lot's of fun learning activities. She uses the material she used to teach her 8th graders so it's all easy as long as you learn your vocabulary.

She is a funny woman and knows a lot about France. She makes learning fun with her little games and by making fun of the lame educational videos. She can be sarcastic or mean, but I don't think she means to hurt anyone's feelings. She doesn't like slackers or tardy people, so be there on time! Do the supercite work! It can drop your grade fast!

Hardly ever came to class, never bought textbook, just be sure to do the Supersite assignments on time and study for the tests and redaction papers... If you forgot to turn something in by the time of class, she lets you email it to her before the end of the day. Very sweet and fun.
Awesome professor. Made it easier to learn french and become more fluent in speaking. Has a great sense of humor and teaches through hands on projects. Very helpful. Best prof to take
